channel.title: Techno Sweat Workout Podcasts - Train At Your Speed
channel.description:
Free Workout Music Sets From Techno Sweat - The Leader in Music for Athletes At Speeds They Can Use For Training

Subscribe to this podcast and get discounts off Techno Sweat albums and CDs - see www.technosweat.com/coupons/coupons.html for details.


Design your own workout albums at www.myworkoutalbum.com.


Get free workout music streamed to your smartphone or iPad 24/7 at www.freeworkoutradio.com.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Techno Sweat Workout Podcasts - Train At Your Speed
channel.itunes:summary: Techno Sweat produces sports music for athletes for training in different speeds. Listen to our samples. Submit your own music for speed changes. Buy our pre-mixed CDs. Watch your speeds improve - swimming, running, cycling.
channel.itunes:author: Techno Sweat LLC
channel.itunes:keywords: workout music, fitness music, techno sweat, sports mix, workout, workout songs, fitness songs, sports training

item.title: Techno Sweat Free Workout Podcast - Cardio Dance 5 - 128 BPM - 60 Minutes
item.description:
Techno Sweat's latest podcast is another terrific continuous play, 128 BPM dance setlist, ideal for cardio, running, circuit training and walking. Great podcast-safe music from musicians around the world.

Enjoy!!

Get more from www.technosweat.com.

item.title: Techno Sweat Free Workout Podcast - Beginner Jump Rope - 30 Minutes
item.description:
Techno Sweat's latest podcast is designed for beginners to learn to jump rope. Jumping is a key for athletes of all kinds to increase their cardiovascular endurance and leg strength. Great podcast-safe music from musicians around the world.

Enjoy!!

Get more from www.technosweat.com.

item.title: Techno Sweat Free Workout Podcast - Advanced Sprint - 30 Minutes
item.description:
Techno Sweat's latest podcast is a challenging 30 minutes of sprint intervals, designed for athletes and trainers alike - 33 minutes of dance music with rests at 135 BPM and three intervals, one at 165 BPM and two at 170 BPM. Great for running, spinning and elliptical workouts. Great podcast-safe music from musicians around the world.

Enjoy!!

Get more from www.technosweat.com.


Subscribe to this podcast and get discounts off Techno Sweat albums and CDs - see www.technosweat.com/coupons/coupons.html for details.

Design your own workout albums at www.myworkoutalbum.com

item.title: Techno Sweat Free Workout Podcast - DANCE Intervals - 30 Minutes
item.description:
Techno Sweat's latest podcast is a challenging 30 minutes of intervals, designed for trainers and athletes alike - 30 minutes of dance music at 135 BPM with a 2-minute interval at 155 BPM and three 2-minute 165 BPM intervals. Great for running, spinning and elliptical workouts. Great podcast-safe music from musicians around the world.

Enjoy!!

Get more from www.technosweat.com.

item.title: Techno Sweat Free Workout Podcast - DANCE II - 128-135 BPM
item.description:
Techno Sweat.com thrills fitness trainers and athletes alike with another of its its FREE workout podcasts, this time a 60-minute DANCE II continuous-play setlist. This setlist starts and ends at 128 BPM, with a solid 40 minutes at 135 BPM in the middle. Terrific podcast-safe music from musicians around the world.

Run, walk, spin, enjoy!

Get more from www.technosweat.com.

Subscribe to this podcast and get discounts off Techno Sweat albums and CDs - see www.technosweat.com/coupons/coupons.html for details.

item.title: Free Music Sample From Techno Sweat
item.description:
Try one of our music tracks designed for consistent training by athletes. This is an original song by Israeli composer/performer Silicon Monk entitled "Coping". Enjoy the full song at 145 beats per minute. Go out and run a mile or two - FAST!

We have lots more music - each song at 5 different speeds!
item.author: info@technosweat.com
